description: This easy dairy-free tartar sauce is made with minimal ingredients in less than 15 minutes. Great with vegan fish sticks, crab cakes, or nuggets.
keywords: dairy-free tartar sauce, vegan tartar sauce
name: Easy Vegan Tartar Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup vegan mayonnaise (we use Follow Your Heart brand)
2 teaspoon lemon juice or white wine vinegar
1 teaspoon vegan Worcestershire sauce (we use Wizard's brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the capers and mince the dill.

In a small bowl, whisk the 1/2 cup vegan mayo, 2 tbsp sweet pickle relish, 2 tsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp capers, 1 tbsp fresh dill, 1 tsp vegan Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp Dijon mustard, and salt and pepper to taste until fully combined.
